etomica.potential

Class PotentialCalculationForcePressureSum

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.potential.PotentialCalculationForceSum
      • etomica.potential.PotentialCalculationForcePressureSum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PotentialCalculation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PotentialCalculationForceStress

    public class PotentialCalculationForcePressureSum
extends PotentialCalculationForceSum
    Sums the force on each iterated atom and adds it to the integrator agent associated with the atom. Additionally, this class has the potential calculate the pressureTensor (which can be done efficiently during the gradient calculation).

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Zeros out the pressureTensor. This method should be called before invoking potentialMaster.calculate so that the pressureTensor is correct at the end of the calculation.
        Overrides:
        reset in class PotentialCalculationForceSum

      • doCalculation

        public void doCalculation(IAtomList atoms,
                          IPotentialAtomic potential)
        Adds forces due to given potential acting on the atoms produced by the iterator. Implemented for only 1- and 2-body potentials.
        Specified by:
        doCalculation in interface PotentialCalculation
        Overrides:
        doCalculation in class PotentialCalculationForceSum
        Parameters:
        atoms - IAtomSet the atom sets for which the calculation is performed.
        potential - The potential used to apply the action defined by this class.

      • getPressureTensor

        public Tensor getPressureTensor()
        Returns the virial portion of pressure tensor calculated during the last potential calculation. In order to be valid, reset() must be called before invoking potentialMaster.calculate. The given tensor has not been normalized by the system volume.
